programme.title: The Last Dance
programme.desc: With Michael Jordan's extraordinary fame came extraordinary scrutiny, and in 1993, it all felt like it came to a head with the Chicago Bulls' pursuit of a third straight title shadowed by question marks about Jordan's gambling.

programme.title: The Last Dance
programme.desc: As Michael Jordan pushes his teammates hard for a sixth NBA title, his intensity and hunger for basketball dominance is in stark contrast to his mindset in October 1993, when he stunned the world by walking away from the game.

programme.title: The Last Dance
programme.desc: Michael Jordan would famously use even the smallest slight imaginable to motivate himself against an opponent. And when his NBA comeback in 1995 fell short in the playoffs, he worked harder than ever to return to form.

programme.title: The Last Dance

programme.title: A360
programme.desc: The Jared Bednar story (from playing days to today). Get to know assistant coach Ray Bennett's story and duties. Get to know skills and goalie coaches Toby Peterson and Jussi Parkilla. Part 2 of Jared Bednar mic'd from a game against Seattle.

programme.title: Coaches With Coffee: Deboer and Maurice
programme.desc: Florida Panthers Head Coach, Paul Maurice, and Dallas Stars Head Coach, Pete DeBoer met for coffee and conversation while in Tampere, Finland for the 2024 NHL Global Series. The coaches share memories of how hockey has helped their friendship.

programme.title: NHL Hockey Colorado Avalanche at Dallas Stars
programme.desc: The Avalanche visit the Stars for Game 1 of their first-round series. Dallas ended the regular season on a seven-game slide. Colorado's Nathan MacKinnon shared the NHL lead with 84 assists. The Stars eliminated the Avs in the West semifinals in 2024.

programme.title: NHL Hockey Colorado Avalanche at Dallas Stars
programme.desc: The injury-depleted Stars try to tie up their first-round series with the Avalanche entering Game 2. Without key players Jason Robertson and Miro Heiskanen, Dallas couldn't stop Colorado's attack in Game 1, falling 5-1. Nathan MacKinnon scored twice.

programme.title: NHL Hockey Dallas Stars at Colorado Avalanche
programme.desc: The rejuvenated Stars visit the Avalanche for Game 3 of their West quarterfinal. Dallas evened the series 1-1 with a 4-3 victory in Game 2 on Colin Blackwell's goal at 17:46 of overtime. Nathan MacKinnon (COL) has tallied three times this series.

programme.title: NHL Hockey Dallas Stars at Colorado Avalanche
programme.desc: The Stars visit the Avalanche for Game 4 of a West quarterfinal. Colorado's Gabriel Landeskog played for the first time since June 26, 2022, but Dallas spoiled the party on Tyler Seguin's goal at 5:31 of overtime in Game 3 to take a 2-1 series lead.

programme.title: NHL Hockey Colorado Avalanche at Dallas Stars
programme.desc: Gabriel Landeskog's Avalanche visit the Stars for a pivotal Game 5 of their Western Conference quarterfinal. Landeskog recorded a goal and an assist, and Mackenzie Blackwood made 23 saves as Colorado evened the series with a 4-0 victory in Game 4.

programme.title: NHL Hockey Dallas Stars at Colorado Avalanche
programme.desc: The Avalanche try to stay alive as they return to the Rockies for Game 6 of their West first-round set with the Stars. Wyatt Johnston scored nine seconds into Game 5, finishing with two goals and an assist as Dallas rolled to a 6-2 decision.

programme.title: NHL Hockey Colorado Avalanche at Dallas Stars
programme.desc: The Avalanche visit the Stars for Game 7 of their West quarterfinal series. Colorado forced a deciding showdown with a 7-4 victory in Game 6 behind Nathan MacKinnon's go-ahead goal in the third period. Dallas coach Peter DeBoer is 8-0 in Game 7s.
